Taking offers on the below, from my original find of over a thousand cards. Recently graded by SGC as I have found a slight upgrade. Great card nice color and clean back. Big scan below...

I'll review any offers and let you guys know, like to sell here vs. eBay. Paypal taken just add a 2%.

Thanks, 

John
